code.description: The numeric code for the associated 'type' property below where 9 = MOBILE TELEPHONE and 8 = EVENING TELEPHONE and 7 = DAYTIME TELEPHONE

type.description:
The particular contact type. Currently supported values:

```
code type
 7   DAYTIME TELEPHONE
 8   EVENING TELEPHONE
 9   MOBILE TELEPHONE
10   FAX
11   PRIMARY E-MAIL
12   SECONDARY E-MAIL
```
If the backend returns an unexpected string it will be returned 'as is', i.e. untransformed, to a maximum of 35 characters.

residences.description: The list of the individual's residences.

noLongerUsed.description:
Indicates if the NOMINATED residence is no longer used (NLU) or not. Currently supported values:
```
Value Meaning
Y     NLU
N     Not NLU i.e. is still in use
```
If the backend returns an unexpected string it will be returned 'as is', i.e. untransformed, to a maximum of a single character.
